name: Fly XR
description:
Fly XR is a virtual reality flight simulator for Oculus Quest. You can fly over a city with an F22, destroy enemy turrets and avoid projectiles or challenge your mind in an endless runner, avoid hitting obstacles.

================== 

We will give priority to your suggestions and recommendations for the next features, so please consider leaving us a comment with your ideas, feedback and experience.

This game is  for Oculus Quest. You can install it on your headset using SideQuest
